Paragraph: OBJECTIVE : Myeloperoxidase antineutrophil cytoplasmic antibody ( MPO - ANCA ) - positive vasculitis has been reported in patients with Graves ' disease who were treated with propylthiouracil ( PTU ) .

Paragraph: OBJECTIVE : Myeloperoxidase antineutrophil cytoplasmic antibody ( MPO - ANCA ) - positive vasculitis has been reported in patients with Graves ' disease who were treated with propylthiouracil ( PTU ) .

| --- |

| Antineutrophil cytoplasmic antibody (ANCA) |

Myeloperoxidase and antineutrophil cytoplasmic antibody are not chemicals but proteins and antibodies, respectively. Therefore, they are not included in the table.
